comp.name: Scout Hull
comp.description: The scout hull, fitted out with everything a scout needs
comp.tpclRequirementsFunction: (lambda (design) (if (> (designType.MaxSize design) (designType.Size design)) (if (= (designType.num-hulls design) 1) (cons #t "") (cons #f "Ship can only have one hull")) (cons #f "This many components can't fit into this Hull")))

comp.name: Battle Scout Hull
comp.description: The battle scout hull
comp.tpclRequirementsFunction: (lambda (design) (if (> (designType.MaxSize design) (designType.Size design)) (if (= (designType.num-hulls design) 1) (cons #t "") (cons #f "Ship can only have one hull")) (cons #f "This many components can't fit into this Hull")))

comp.name: Advanced Battle Scout Hull
comp.description: The advanced battle scout hull, packing a bigger punch into a smaller and faster package
comp.tpclRequirementsFunction: (lambda (design) (if (> (designType.MaxSize design) (designType.Size design)) (if (= (designType.num-hulls design) 1) (cons #t "") (cons #f "Ship can only have one hull")) (cons #f "This many components can't fit into this Hull")))

comp.name: Frigate
comp.description: The Frigate, a cheap ship that can easily destroy larger ships
comp.tpclRequirementsFunction: (lambda (design) (if (> (designType.MaxSize design) (designType.Size design)) (if (= (designType.num-hulls design) 1) (cons #t "") (cons #f "Ship can only have one hull")) (cons #f "This many components can't fit into this Hull")))

comp.tpclRequirementsFunction: (lambda (design) (if (> (designType.MaxSize design) (designType.Size design)) (if (= (designType.num-hulls design) 1) (cons #t "") (cons #f "Ship can only have one hull")) (cons #f "This many components can't fit into this Hull")))

comp.name: Destroyer

comp.tpclRequirementsFunction: (lambda (design) (if (> (designType.MaxSize design) (designType.Size design)) (if (= (designType.num-hulls design) 1) (cons #t "") (cons #f "Ship can only have one hull")) (cons #f "This many components can't fit into this Hull")))

comp.name: Battleship
comp.description: The Battleship, a ship that is hugely armored and armed.
comp.tpclRequirementsFunction: (lambda (design) (if (> (designType.MaxSize design) (designType.Size design)) (if (= (designType.num-hulls design) 1) (cons #t "") (cons #f "Ship can only have one hull")) (cons #f "This many components can't fit into this Hull")))

comp.name: Dreadnought
comp.description: The dreadnought is the largest moveable ship available.
comp.tpclRequirementsFunction: (lambda (design) (if (> (designType.MaxSize design) (designType.Size design)) (if (= (designType.num-hulls design) 1) (cons #t "") (cons #f "Ship can only have one hull")) (cons #f "This many components can't fit into this Hull")))

comp.name: Argonaut
comp.description: The argonaut is a huge ship that can't break orbit.
comp.tpclRequirementsFunction: (lambda (design) (if (> (designType.MaxSize design) (designType.Size design)) (if (= (designType.num-hulls design) 1) (cons #t "") (cons #f "Ship can only have one hull")) (cons #f "This many components can't fit into this Hull")))

comp.name: Uranium Explosives
comp.description: Most basic nuclear explosive
comp.tpclRequirementsFunction: (lambda (design) (if (= (designType.num-hulls design) 1) (cons #t "") (cons #f "This component requires a Missile or Torpedoe Hull")))

comp.name: Thorium Explosives
comp.description: A significantly cheaper but less explosive nuclear explosive
comp.tpclRequirementsFunction: (lambda (design) (if (= (designType.num-hulls design) 1) (cons #t "") (cons #f "This component requires a Missile or Torpedoe Hull")))

comp.name: Cerium Explosives
comp.description: A huge but extremely explosive sub-nuclear particle
comp.tpclRequirementsFunction: (lambda (design) (if (= (designType.num-hulls design) 1) (cons #t "") (cons #f "This component requires a Missile or Torpedoe Hull")))

comp.description: An enhanced version of uranium which is more explosive
comp.tpclRequirementsFunction: (lambda (design) (if (= (designType.num-hulls design) 1) (cons #t "") (cons #f "This component requires a Missile or Torpedoe Hull")))

comp.name: Massivium

comp.tpclRequirementsFunction: (lambda (design) (if (= (designType.num-hulls design) 1) (cons #t "") (cons #f "This component requires a Missile or Torpedoe Hull")))

comp.name: Antiparticle Explosives
comp.description: An extremely expensive but hugely explosive particle and anit-particle explosive

comp.name: Alpha Missile Tube
comp.description: An alpha missile tube, capable of firing one alpha missile per combat round
comp.tpclRequirementsFunction: (lambda (design) (if (designType.num-hulls design) (if (> (designType.MaxSize design) (designType.Size design)) (cons #t "") (cons #f "This many components can't fit into this Hull")) (cons #f "This component requires a Ship Hull")))

comp.name: Alpha Missile Rack
comp.description: An alpha missile rack, capable of holding 2 alpha missiles
comp.tpclRequirementsFunction: (lambda (design) (if (> (designType.MaxSize design) (designType.Size design)) (if (= (designType.num-hulls design) 1) (cons #t "") (cons #f "This component requires a Ship Hull")) (cons #f "This many components can't fit into this Hull")))

comp.name: Armor
comp.description: Armor reduces the damage taken by 0.1%
comp.tpclRequirementsFunction: (lambda (design) (if (= (designType._num-components design) 1) (cons #t "") (cons #f "This is a complete component, nothing else can be included")))

comp.name: Colonisation Module
comp.description: Allows the ship to colonise a planet.
comp.tpclRequirementsFunction: (lambda (design) (if (> (designType.MaxSize design) (designType.Size design)) (if (= (designType.Colonise design) 1) (cons #t "") (cons #f "Can have only one colonisation module.")) (cons #f "This many components can't fit into this Hull")))

prop.name: _num-components
prop.description: The total number of components in the design

prop.name: Speed
prop.description: The number of units the ship can move each turn

prop.name: AmmoCost
prop.description: The relative expensiveness of the explosive

prop.name: AmmoExplosiveness
prop.description: The explosiveness of a unit of the explosive used in the weapons of the ship
prop.tpclDisplayFunction: (lambda (design bits) (let ((n (apply + bits))) (cons n (string-append (number->string n) " hit points")) ) )

prop.name: AmmoSize
prop.description: The relative size of a unit of the explosive used in the weapons of the ship

prop.name: Firepower
prop.description: How much damage the weapons of the ship can do in a single round
prop.tpclDisplayFunction: (lambda (design bits) (let ((n (apply + bits))) (cons n (string-append (number->string n) " hit points")) ) )

prop.name: MissileCost
prop.description: The relative cost of a missile

prop.name: MissileFirepower
prop.description: How much damage a missile can do
prop.tpclDisplayFunction: (lambda (design bits) (let ((n (apply + bits))) (cons n (string-append (number->string n) " hit points")) ) )

prop.name: TorpedoeCost
prop.description: The relative cost of a torpedoe

prop.name: TorpedoeFirepower
prop.description: How much damage a torpedoe can do
prop.tpclDisplayFunction: (lambda (design bits) (let ((n (apply + bits))) (cons n (string-append (number->string n) " hit points")) ) )

prop.name: TorpedoeSize
prop.description: The relative size of a torpedoe

prop.name: StartingHitPoints
prop.description: How much damage the ship can take before being destroyed
prop.tpclDisplayFunction: (lambda (design bits) (let ((n (apply + bits))) (cons n (string-append (number->string n) " hit points")) ) )

prop.name: ProductCost
prop.description: The number of turns to build this

prop.name: Armor
prop.description: The amount of armor on the ship

prop.name: HitPoints
prop.description: The number of HP this ship has

prop.name: Colonise
prop.description: Can the ship colonise planets

prop.name: num-ammo
prop.displayName: Number of missile and torpedoe warhead types
prop.description: The number of missile and torpedoe warhead types in the design
prop.tpclDisplayFunction: (lambda (design bits)(let ((n (apply + bits)))(cons n (string-append (number->string n) " explosive types"))))

prop.name: num-baytypes
prop.displayName: Number of missile or torpedoe types
prop.description: The number of missile or torpedoe types in the design

prop.name: num-hulls
prop.description: The number of hulls in the design

prop.name: Size
prop.description: The size of the ship in the design

prop.name: MaxSize
prop.description: The maximum size of the ship in the design

prop.description: The total number of components in the design
